thread.title: Royals owner compares David Murphy to Babe Ruth
thread.title_full: Royals owner compares David Murphy to Babe Ruth

author: Grey Papke
title: Royals owner compares David Murphy to Babe Ruth
text:
Royals owner compares David Murphy to Babe Ruth Larry Brown Sports 6 hrs ago Grey Papke © Elsa/Getty Images David Murphy has officially drawn comparisons to Babe Ruth. The Kansas City Royals clinched their second consecutive trip to the World Series on Friday with a 4-3 win over the Toronto Blue Jays, and owner David Glass is looking ahead to the Mets and, specifically, Daniel Murphy.
AdChoices Murphy, of course, hit 14 home runs in the regular season and already has seven in nine postseason games, including a homer in each of his last six. Glass, it seems, has taken notice.
"They're gonna be a handful. And Murphy himself is the reincarnation of Babe Ruth." -- Royals owner David Glass on the Mets, Daniel Murphy
— Jeff Passan (@JeffPassan) October 24, 2015 The reincarnation of Babe Ruth may be a bit strong and these types of runs are rarely sustainable, but all eyes will definitely be on Murphy when the World Series starts. Did you see the highlights from that game he basically won by himself ? Though, perhaps Glass may want to worry more about the extremely formidable Mets pitching staff.
